name: Nerhidia
description:
Nerhidia

This is a turn-based strategy game, about 45 minutes long.

Note: If you're using the itch.io client, you can't see the web version. So if you want to play the web version, open this site in a browser.

Story

The year is 1094. You're the king of Nerhidia. Your kingdom is attacked by its neighbour - Maga. To make things even worse, the people in Nerhidia are discontent with your government and organize a movement that requires that you let Magans in and stop fighting against them. How will you decide?

The game is short, but non-linear and has three endings - a good one, a medium one and a bad one.

Nerhidia is prequel for another game by me - 20 fights.

How to help

If you like Nerhidia, I'll be glad for every positive review and for every comment that advises me how to improve the game. Thank you in advance!
